TEXT.TITLE: HOLLY CORP <HOC> 2ND QTR JAN 31 LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 45 cts vs profit 20 cts Net loss 1,841,000 vs profit 983,000 Revs 56.2 mln vs 102.9 mln Six mths Shr loss 13 cts vs profit 80 cts Net loss 534,000 vs profit 4.4 mln Revs 121.4 mln vs 209.3 mln NOTE: Six months fiscal 1987 includes loss of 17 cts per share from discontinued operations. Per share figures also reflect partial three-for-one stock split effected December 1985. Reuter
